result.markdown: --- title: "About" #description: "Bioinformatician" aliases: - index.html image: images/pibs_profile.jpg about: template: trestles links: - icon: github href: https://github.com/kelly-sovacool - icon: envelope href: mailto:kelly@sovacool.dev - icon: mastodon href: https://mastodon.social/@kelly_sovacool - icon: twitter href: https://twitter.com/kelly_sovacool - icon: linkedin href: https://linkedin.com/in/kelly-sovacool - text: "{{< fa brands orcid >}}" # https://github.com/quarto-ext/fontawesome/issues/6 href: https://orcid.org/0000-0003-3283-829X execute: echo: false --- :::{#hero-heading} Hi, I'm Kelly! I'm a [Bioinformatics](https://medicine.umich.edu/dept/computational-medicine-bioinformatics) PhD candidate in [Pat Schloss' lab](http://www.schlosslab.org/) at the University of Michigan. I develop bioinformatics tools and data analysis pipelines for microbial ecology and host-associated microbiome research. I'm a fan of open science, open source software, and reproducible research. When I'm not in the dry lab, you might find me running, cycling, climbing, or otherwise being active outside. I also volunteer with [Girls Who Code](http://umich.edu/~girlswc/), teach [Software Carpentry](https://umcarpentries.github.io/) workshops, host [CoderSpaces office hours](https://datascience.isr.umich.edu/events/coderspaces/), and moonlight as a [live sound engineer](https://sovacool.dev/latex-cv/sound.pdf). ::: ::: {.cell} :::
